description: Create a clone of a volume or snapshot.

description.description: Description of the clone. This value must contain 128 or fewer printable Unicode characters.

host_group_id.description: Unique identifier of the host group to be attached to the clone. Only one of host_id or host_group_id can be supplied.

host_id.description: Unique identifier of the host to be attached to the clone. Only one of host_id or host_group_id can be supplied.

id.description: Unique identifier of the volume or snapshot to create a clone of.

logical_unit_number.description: Optional logical unit number when creating a mapped volume.  If no host_id or host_group_id is specified, this property is ignored.

name.description: Name of the clone. This value must contain 128 or fewer printable Unicode characters.

performance_policy_id.description: Unique identifier of the  performance policy.

protection_policy_id.description: Unique identifier of the protection policy.
